name: web-rendering-lambda
description: Serverless Lambda for rendering webpages to PNG, JPEG and PDF.

scripts.package-with-chrome: yarn package-prepare && tar -xzf headless-chromium.tar.gz -C dist && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-without-chrome: yarn package-prepare && cd dist && rm -f ../package.zip && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: yarn babel && cp -r package.json yarn.lock dist && cd dist && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 yarn install --production
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --extensions .ts,.js --out-dir dist
scripts.start: yarn babel && cp -r node_modules dist && node dist/localserver.js
